bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, disc only, double butted TT and ORE DT, externally relieved head tube, internally relieved BB shell, reinforced disc mount, forged 3D dropouts w/ replaceable 98954020 hanger

Specialized 3D forged alloy, two bolt, 25.4mm, 10 degree rise
Alloy 25.4mm XC Rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back, 6 degree up sweep, 3.2mm thick

Shimano 415, mechanical disc, 6" Center Lock rotors
Shimano FCM-341-8, Octalink Spline, replaceable rings
Shimano ES-25, Octalink Spline, cartridge bearing, 68 x 126mm for 50mm chain line
